segments.text: What an irresponsible scene in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there drying a stupid plate while the sink overflows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see or hear the water gushing out?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is a hazard, and her foot's already in it—idiot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up to no good, climbing on that flimsy stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stealing cookies like little thieves, and she doesn't even supervise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's going to fall and break his neck on that thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl encourages it by reaching for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is a mess; parents should watch their kids better.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage everywhere, and no one's doing a thing about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside mocks this indoor nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how careless they all are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this before it's a catastrophe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, everything wet—total disregard.
segments.speaker: PAR
